resources.string: An entry level software engineer with a bachelor\'s degree in computer science. I am proficient in major computer technologies raging from working autonomous servers, operating system, programming, architecture concepts and principles
Promoted company projects and campaigns to potential clients. Created reports and data-driven presentations. Attended various lectures and events whiles engaging with other students and Instructors
Induction into the Council of Computer Professionals Nigeria

Its an online voting app through which voters can vote in ongoing elections created by election Admins. Only verified voters will be bale to vote and candidate can enroll for the election. Built with: Kotlin and Firebase

Its an application with the main intent of incorporating the principles of working with MVVM architecture with its main functionality derived from using certain database information and authentication support Built with: Kotlin, API, Retrofit, Firebase

At the company as an ideal candidate i aid in creating technical design and implementation of new products and maintaining of existing products.
